spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The thri-kreen casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thri-kreen makes two Gythka attacks or four Psychic Bolt attacks.

action.name: Gythka
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Psychic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) psychic damage.

action.name: Drain Vitality (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The thri-kreen targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 32 ({@damage 5d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The thri-kreen regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

bonus.name: Chameleon Carapace
entries: The thri-kreen changes the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings, gaining advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes to hide in those surroundings.
